description:
Neal is 20 and he LOVES to travel.
"I do landscaping and I'm also a sous chef," he told us. "I like to save up enough money and then travel for a few months."
He likes to stay single because it makes things less complicated.
"I meet a lot of people when I travel," he said. "I like to be able to have sex without feeling like I'm cheating."
One thing I noticed is that he refers to his sexual partners in a gender-neutral manner.
"I'm somewhere in the middle," he said. "I like girls and I've been with a lot of them but sometimes they get boring. Then I switch to being with guys!"
title: Neal
